name: Props N´ Seekers
description:
Not just a prop hunt!

Props N´ Seekers its not all about hiding, and finding, but you can use your Tunts to
get more xp, or, you can use your custom loadout of your emotes and skins(in future versions).

This is Alpha (v0.5) and still have much bugs, but we are work in on it, and so much things is gonna change!

This page is gonna change too, it looks horible...
